metadata.title: CVE-2018-7867 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: There is a heap-based buffer overflow in the getString function ofutil/decompile.c in libming 0.4.8 during a RegisterNumber sprintf. ACrafted input will lead to a denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
